description: The Transportation Department on Friday canceled $679 million in federal funding for a dozen offshore wind projects, the latest attack by the Trump administration on the reeling U.S. offshore wind industry.

name: California
title: Virginia school district sues Education Dept. over gender policies - The Washington Post
description: Two Virginia school districts sued the U.S. Department of Education on Friday, seeking to stop the agency from freezing millions in federal funding ...

name: California
title: Feds threaten to pull funding from SC sex education programs | wcnc.com
description: South Carolina could lose more than $1 million in federal funding over its sex education curriculum. Author: wcnc.com.

name: California
title: 'Gender ideology' has no place in sex ed, Trump White House says
description: “Federal funds will not be used to poison the minds of the next generation or advance dangerous ideological agendas," said Andrew Gradison of the HHS.
